name: com.lingotion.thespeon
description:
Lingotion Thespeon is an on-device AI engine designed to generate real-time character acting and voiceovers.
The package runs entirely offline on the player's device, eliminating cloud costs and network dependencies.

See https://github.com/Lingotion/lingotion-thespeon-unity/blob/main/README.md to get started.

_upm.changelog:
# [1.2.0] - 2025-09-22
## Added
* New `OnSynthesisFailed` callback for ThespeonEngine.
## Fixed
* Synthesis of multiple simultaneous engines no longer results in resource collisions.
* Thespeon now properly waits until the end of the frame during synthesis.
* Inference failure in the ThespeonInfoWindow no longer results in a non-responsive UI.
